DOC.brief_title: Optimal Timing Misoprostol Administration Prior Office Hysteroscopy
DOC.detailed_description: The interval misoprostol administration office hysteroscopy may influence effectiveness pain reduction . There limited data optimal interval administration misoprostol office hysteroscopy . In previous study , time interval administration misoprostol office hysteroscopy range 2 hour 24 hour . Till study yet investigate optimal timing misoprostol administration prior office hysteroscopy operative hysteroscopy . The aim study determine whether misoprostol administer 12 hour office hysteroscopy relieve pain effectively compare misoprostol administer 3 hour office hysteroscopy
